name: Robo Rescue (rden820)
description:
OVERVIEW:

Your robot friend has been captured by a band of orcs! Can you sneak him out, or will you try to persuade the orcs to release him?

Game Controls:

Click around the map to move the player to that location. Click on the robot to activate it and move next to it. Then, bring the robot back to the square you started at.

The goal is to head out into the map and find the robot before being captured by the orcs. To complete the game you have to bring the robot back to your start position. 

(NOTE: Currently in game this objective is not obvious, but at some point I wish to add something to make this clearer).

Search For a Star Game Programming Project
